summary:
Caltech is a top research university in Pasadena, California. Founded in 1891 as a vocational school, it transformed into a leading science and engineering institution. Caltech has made many scientific advancements, especially in space research and physics. The university has a small campus with excellent research facilities and a strong honor code. 

Caltech students excel in sports and academics, with many alumni winning Nobel Prizes and other prestigious awards. It is known for its high number of Nobel laureates per capita in the United States.
title: California Institute of Technology
